New forms of travel: Commercial airlines and airplane models would have to be redesigned to accommodate for the ability to fly.
Reduction in car usage: Flying instead of driving cars can lead to a reduction in traffic and air pollution.
Changes in urban planning: Flying might reduce the need for public transportation and city infrastructures.
New uses for existing buildings: High-rise buildings could have additional decks or platforms for flying, and the height of buildings might be reduced.
Revaluation of property prices: High-rise buildings and lands near airports could become more valuable due to the added benefit of being able to fly.
